title: How do I remove a texture from a Color Sprite in the Scene Editor?
body:
To remove a texture do the following for a workaround

  1. Change the name of the texture that you want to remove in your assets. So it no longer exists at least temporarily. I just add an "a" at the end of the texture name in my assets.

  2. Delete the texture name in the attributes inspector box. Just press the return key where the texture field is. This removes the texture.

Afterwards you can go back to your assets if you want and change the texture name back.
